src:
Danes se bo razjasnilo, jutri ponovno dež
07 Nov 2019, 09:08 by STA

Danes zjutraj bodo padavine povsod ponehale, po nekaterih nižinah se bo zadrževala megla. Dopoldne bo še pretežno oblačno, popoldne pa se bo delno razjasnilo. Najvišje dnevne temperature bodo od 11 do 16, v alpskih dolinah okoli 9 stopinj Celzija, je zapisano na spletnih straneh Agencije RS za okolje.



Dopoldne bo še pretežno oblačno, popoldne pa se bo delno razjasnilo. Foto: Maja Pertič Gombač

LJUBLJANA > V petek zjutraj bo oblačnost na zahodu naraščala, začelo bo rahlo deževati. Drugje bo še deloma jasno in po nekaterih nižinah megleno. Čez dan se bo postopno povsod pooblačilo. Padavine se bodo proti večeru počasi širile v notranjost, ob morju bodo nastajale tudi nevihte. Ob morju bo pihal okrepljen jugo, drugje pa šibak veter vzhodnih smeri. Jutranje temperature bodo od 1 do 7, na Primorskem okoli 12, najvišje dnevne od 10 do 15, v alpskih dolinah okoli 5 stopinj Celzija.
Obeti: V noči na soboto bo dež zajel vso državo in v soboto dopoldne postopno ponehal, razjasnilo se bo. V nedeljo se bo na zahodu delno razjasnilo, drugod bo pretežno oblačno, dopoldne bodo na vzhodu še rahle padavine.
Vremenska slika: Hladna fronta se je pomaknila nad južni Balkan, nad Britanskim otočjem se je poglobilo novo ciklonsko območje. Nad naše kraje z jugozahodnimi vetrovi doteka prehodno nekoliko manj vlažen in razmeroma topel zrak.
Napoved za sosednje pokrajine: Danes se bo postopno razjasnilo, več oblačnosti bo ostalo v hribovitih krajih Furlanije-Julijske krajine in v Gorskem kotarju. V petek bo v krajih zahodno od nas oblačno in deževno, drugje bo večji del dneva še suho. Ob Jadranu se bo krepil jugo.
Biovreme: Danes bo vremenska obremenitev oslabela, ne bo pa povsem ponehala. Spanje občutljivih v noči na petek bo moteno.
text:
Today will clear, tomorrow it will rain again
07 Nov 2019, 09:08 by STA

This morning, the rainfall will end everywhere, and fog will persist along some lowlands. It will be mostly cloudy in the morning, and in the afternoon it will clear up somewhat. The highest daily temperatures will be from 11 to 16, in the alpine valleys around 9 degrees Celsius, according to the website of the Environmental Agency of the Republic of Slovenia.



It will be mostly cloudy in the morning, and in the afternoon it will clear up somewhat. Photo: Maja Pertic Gombac

LJUBLJANA> On Friday morning, cloudy skies in the west will start, and it will start raining slightly. Elsewhere it will be partly clear and misty in some lowlands. There will be a gradual empowerment throughout the day. Rainfall will gradually spread inland in the evening, with storms along the sea. There will be a strong south wind at the seaside and a weak wind in the east. Morning temperatures will be from 1 to 7, in the Primorska region around 12, the highest daily from 10 to 15, in the Alpine valleys around 5 degrees Celsius.
Outlook: On Saturday nights, rain will cover the entire country and gradually phase out on Saturday morning, it will clear up. On Sunday, it will be partly clear in the west, with mostly cloudy skies in the morning, with light rainfall in the east in the morning.
Weather: The Cold Front has moved over the southern Balkans, and a new cyclone zone has deepened over the British Isles. Somewhat less humid and relatively warm air flows above our places with southwest winds.
Forecast for neighboring provinces: Today, it will gradually clear up, more cloudiness will remain in the hilly regions of Friuli-Venezia Giulia and Gorski kotar. On Friday, it will be cloudy and rainy in places west of us, while elsewhere it will be dry most of the day. Along the Adriatic it will strengthen south.
Bio-weather: Today the weather load will be weakened, but it will not completely disappear. Sleeping sensitive on Friday nights will be disturbed.
